config.name: config
config.description: Path to your config file, if not in <%= config.configDir %>/config.js.

token.name: token
token.description: Your Notion Integration Token. (NOTE: If you specify an environment variable of 'NOTION_INTEGRATION_TOKEN', that may be used.)

args.name: bibtexPath
args.description: Path to the BibTeX file you would like to sync with Notion.

args.name: bibtexDiff
args.description: Path to the BibTeX file you would like to diff "bibtexPath" against.

articles:sync.summary: Syncs your Articles Database with the local BibTeX file.
articles:sync.description: Strictly creates or updates articles based on the ID assigned by Paperpile.

authors:clean.description:
1. Removes dangling authors with no articles.
  2. Attempts to clean up and merge authors and aliases.

authors:sync.summary: Syncs your Authors Database with the local BibTeX file.
authors:sync.description: Authors will be created if not present (or if they don't match a manually entered alias). Otherwise, Authors will have their name stripped of whitespace and articles consolidation based on matching Aliases.
